Text:
One tip.
Change number on the files in the lib. so will all work nice during instal.

"reknyl" one tip back to you :-)
CD1 is CD1 and also known as "Run disk". CD2 is the install-CD.
This is the way it comes from Micro$oft, ok!? You do not have to change any numbers at any time to install. Just mount the disks as they are
Run Disc is CD 2! Install is CD 1 and nothin else!
